issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The Hyperloop Example App linked from the body at http://labs.appcelerator.com/project/55f74a9f421c44837717716b/Hyperloop-Module includes the {{Resources}} folder, which it - since it's an Alloy app - should not.

This issue isn't to big by itself, but because of TIMOB-20245 it makes the example impossible run without a clean first.
fields.summary: Hyperloop: Example should not include Resources folder

comments.body: Fixed in some of the recent commits, thanks Fokke!
